alert.note: Alert for Lawrence; Martin (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 09 at 11:11AM EST until March 12 at 3:00AM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana... East Fork White River near Bedford down to Williams. White River from at Edwardsport down to Hazleton. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... East Fork White River near Rivervale. .Minor flooding is ongoing across southern Indiana due to widespread 2 to 3 inches of rainfall that fell Friday March 3rd. Flooding is expected to end Saturday on the East Fork White River... although minor flooding is expected to persist on lower portions of the White River well into next week with additional rain expected tonight and again this weekend. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...East Fork White River at Williams. * WHEN...Until early Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 8.9 feet, Water now begins to cover State Road 450 at the Public Access Site just east of Williams. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:18 AM EST Thursday the stage was 8.5 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:18 AM EST Thursday was 8.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 8.8 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday afternoon. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
